mapper.insert: insert into oc_document (dno, writer, content, tag, image) values (oc_document_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{content}, #{tag}, #{image})
mapper.select: select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from(select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from oc_document natural join oc_user where writer IN (select sender from oc_friend_rel where sender = #{user_id} union select receiver from oc_friend_rel where sender = #{user_id}) order by writedate desc)

select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from( select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image, rownum rn from( select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from oc_document where writer = #{writer} ordey by writedate desc )) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from oc_document where wirter = #{user_id}
